text: Carlos Enrique Rentería Olaya (born July 5, 1995 in Valle del Cauca, Colombia) is a Colombian professional footballer who currently plays as a defensive midfielder for Botafogo. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Deportivo Cali footballers Category:FC Juárez footballers Category:Deportes Tolima footballers Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Botafogo de Futebol e Regatas players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Brazil Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Brazil Category:People from Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca
title: Carlos Enrique Rentería
